explanation: The stage direction 'Il présente à Junon trois pailles qu'il a ramassées' describes a character showing an object (the three straws) to another character (Junon). This fits the delivery category, as it involves the manner of presenting or showing something, not just a general action. The focus is on the manner of the delivery of the object.
stgdir: Il présente à Junon trois pailles qu'il a ramassées.
